Package com.ltsllc.miranda

Class OtherMessages

java.lang.Object
com.ltsllc.miranda.OtherMessages
public class OtherMessages extends Object
A file that contains messages we are not responsible for delivering.

    • recordOwner

      public void recordOwner(UUID messageUuid, UUID ownerUuid) throws IOException
      Record the owner of a message Note that the method uses Miranda#PROPERTY_OWNER_FILE as the file name for the file.
      Parameters:
      messageUuid - The uuid of a message.
      ownerUuid - The uuid of the node that owns the message.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is a problem manipulating the owner file.
      See Also:
      • Miranda.PROPERTY_OWNER_FILE

    • getOwnerOf

      public UUID getOwnerOf(UUID uuid)
      Return the owner of a message, or null if we don't know
      Parameters:
      uuid - The uuid of the message we are interested in.
      Returns:
      The uuid of the node that owns the message or null if we don't know.
